text: The 1980–81 DePaul Blue Demons men's basketball team represented DePaul University during the 1980–81 NCAA Division I men's basketball season. They were led by head coach Ray Meyer, in his 39th season, and played their home games at the brand new Rosemont Horizon in Rosemont. ==Roster== ==Schedule== |- !colspan=12 style=| NCAA Tournament Source: ==Team players drafted into the NBA== {|class="wikitable" width="70%" |- align="center" style="" | Round || Pick || Player || NBA Club |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 1 || 1 || Mark Aguirre || Dallas Mavericks |- align="center" bgcolor="" | 2 || 38 || Clyde Bradshaw || Atlanta Hawks |- align="center" bgcolor="" |} == References == DePaul Category:1980 in sports in Illinois Category:DePaul Blue Demons men's basketball seasons Category:1981 in sports in Illinois DePaul
title: 1980–81 DePaul Blue Demons men's basketball team
